languages.text: "Бессердечного" сопровождает небольшая флотилия — от нее надо избавиться, чтобы захватить фрегат. Ударные отряды Арбитес высадятся на верхнюю палубу, пока ваши абордажники займутся остальными отсеками. Мой отряд арбитров возьмет на себя самую сложную и опасную часть операции. Конечная цель — захват капитанского мостика, допрос и казнь Саргоны".

"The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."
languages.original_text: "Бессердечного" сопровождает небольшая флотилия — от нее надо избавиться, чтобы захватить фрегат. Ударные отряды Арбитес высадятся на верхнюю палубу, пока ваши абордажники займутся остальными отсеками. Мой отряд арбитров возьмет на себя самую сложную и опасную часть операции. Конечная цель — захват капитанского мостика, допрос и казнь Саргоны".

languages.text: «Una flotilla escolta a la Desalmada; tendrá que neutralizarla para capturar la fragata. Los equipos de ataque del Arbites aterrizarán en la cubierta superior mientras su equipo de abordaje se encarga de las otras bahías. Mi escuadrón de Arbitrator se encargará de la parte más difícil y peligrosa de la operación. Nuestro objetivo es capturar el puente del capitán e interrogar y ejecutar a Sargona».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."

traits.locale_text: «Una flotilla escolta a la Desalmada; tendrá que neutralizarla para capturar la fragata. Los equipos de ataque del Arbites aterrizarán en la cubierta superior mientras su equipo de abordaje se encarga de las otras bahías. Mi escuadrón de Arbitrator se encargará de la parte más difícil y peligrosa de la operación. Nuestro objetivo es capturar el puente del capitán e interrogar y ejecutar a Sargona».

languages.text: “无心号周围有一支小型舰队，你需要先消灭这支舰队，才能夺得那艘船。法务部的战斗人员会在上层甲板登舰，而你的登舰部队负责处理其余的甲板区域。我的法务官小队会负责整场行动中最困难、最危险的部分。我们的最终目标是占领无心号舰桥，审讯萨戈纳，将其绳之以法。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."

traits.locale_text: “无心号周围有一支小型舰队，你需要先消灭这支舰队，才能夺得那艘船。法务部的战斗人员会在上层甲板登舰，而你的登舰部队负责处理其余的甲板区域。我的法务官小队会负责整场行动中最困难、最危险的部分。我们的最终目标是占领无心号舰桥，审讯萨戈纳，将其绳之以法。”

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur est escorté par une flottille que vous devrez neutraliser avant d'arraisonner la frégate. Les équipes d'intervention de l'Arbites se poseront sur le pont supérieur pendant que votre groupe d'abordage se concentrera sur les autres baies. Mon escouade d'arbitrators se chargera de la partie la plus difficile et dangereuse de l'opération. Notre objectif final est de prendre le contrôle de la passerelle du capitaine et d'interroger Sargona avant de l'exécuter. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur est escorté par une flottille que vous devrez neutraliser avant d'arraisonner la frégate. Les équipes d'intervention de l'Arbites se poseront sur le pont supérieur pendant que votre groupe d'abordage se concentrera sur les autres baies. Mon escouade d'arbitrators se chargera de la partie la plus difficile et dangereuse de l'opération. Notre objectif final est de prendre le contrôle de la passerelle du capitaine et d'interroger Sargona avant de l'exécuter. »

languages.text: 「ハートレスは小さな船団によってエスコートされていますので、そのフリゲート艦を捕らえるためには無力化する必要があります。アルビテスのストライク・チームは上層デッキに上陸し、あなたの乗り込み部隊が残りの部屋に対処します。私のアービトレイターの集団は作戦の最も難しい危険な部分を担当します。最終目標はキャプテンのブリッジを制圧し、サルゴナを尋問して処刑することです」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスは小さな船団によってエスコートされていますので、そのフリゲート艦を捕らえるためには無力化する必要があります。アルビテスのストライク・チームは上層デッキに上陸し、あなたの乗り込み部隊が残りの部屋に対処します。私のアービトレイターの集団は作戦の最も難しい危険な部分を担当します。最終目標はキャプテンのブリッジを制圧し、サルゴナを尋問して処刑することです」

languages.text: "Taşkalp'e küçük bir filotilla eşlik ediyor. Fırkateyni ele geçirmek için filotillayı etkisiz hâle getirmeniz şart. Arbites vurucu ekipleri üst güverteye çıkarken bordalama ekibiniz de kalan bölmelerle ilgilenecek. Yargıcı ekibim, harekâtın en zor ve tehlikeli kısmını üstlenecek. Nihai hedefimiz, kaptan köprüsünü ele geçirmek ve Sargona'yı sorgulayıp infaz etmektir."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp'e küçük bir filotilla eşlik ediyor. Fırkateyni ele geçirmek için filotillayı etkisiz hâle getirmeniz şart. Arbites vurucu ekipleri üst güverteye çıkarken bordalama ekibiniz de kalan bölmelerle ilgilenecek. Yargıcı ekibim, harekâtın en zor ve tehlikeli kısmını üstlenecek. Nihai hedefimiz, kaptan köprüsünü ele geçirmek ve Sargona'yı sorgulayıp infaz etmektir."

languages.text: "Die Heartless wird von einer kleinen Flotille begleitet ... die vor der Übernahme des Flaggschiffs neutralisiert werden muss. Eingreifteams des Adeptus Arbites werden auf dem Oberdeck landen, während sich Euer Entertrupp um die übrigen Module kümmert. Mein Trupp wird den schwierigsten und gefährlichsten Teil der Operation übernehmen. Ziel der Mission ist neben der Übernahme der Brücke die Befragung und Exekution von Sargona."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless is escorted by a small flotilla — you'll need to neutralise it in order to capture the frigate. Arbites strike teams will land on the upper deck while your boarding party handles the remaining bays. My squad of Arbitrators will take on the most difficult and dangerous part of the operation. The ultimate goal is to capture the captain's bridge, and interrogate and execute Sargona."
